2timepwnotsame: The two passwords you entered do not match. Please retry.

activation.error: Sorry, due to an error, your email address could not be successfully verified. Details:
activation.lackinfo:
Verification failed because your URL does not contain all the information.
This may be due to an error in your email application or the URL you copied is incomplete.
Please make sure to copy the link provided in the email completely and try again. If this problem recurs, please try to contact nmTeam for help.
activation.tip:
As the last step of registering an nmTeam account, we need to verify your E-Mail address to make sure it is your own email address.
If your E-Mail address cannot be verified, you can try refreshing this page. If this is not resolved, please contact nmTeam for help.

cantLog.0: nmTeam found that some users who use Safari or open their browsers' feature to block third-party cookies or similar functions may have problems logging in to their nmTeam account, such as:
cantLog.2: ·After logging in successfully, it still shows that you are not logged in when you jump to the target application
cantLog.3: ·When you use nmTeam Account Center to manage your account, you will jump to the management page after a successful login, and then quickly jump to the login page
cantLog.4: If the above situation occurs, you need to update your browser settings to solve the problem.
cantLog.5: If you are a Safari user or are using iOS or iPadOS:
cantLog.6: 1. Go to "Settings", scroll down and click on the "Safari" setting item. Or on macOS, choose "Safari"> "Preferences" and click "Privacy."
cantLog.7: 2. In "Safari Settings", make sure that the "Prevent Cross-Site Tracking" and "Block All Cookies" options in the "PRIVACY & SECURITY" settings are turned off, otherwise please turn them off.
cantLog.8: 3. If this does not solve the problem, please click this link and restart your browser. Normally, the nmTeam User Center will help you do this the first time you visit.
cantLog.9: 4. If the problem persists after accessing the link, please try to clear the website data of nmteam.ml and api-nmteam.agou.im. Please visit the Apple Support website to learn how to do this.
cantLog.10: If you use a browser on another device and encounter problems:
cantLog.11: Please try to turn off your browser plug-in, change the cookie-related settings in your browser, or refer to the solutions for Safari users or users using iOS or iPadOS. If your problem still cannot be solved, please try to change your browser or another device, and report this problem to nmTeam.
cantLog.h: General Solutions to Problems Encountered When Logging In to an nmTeam Account

changeavatar.error: Sorry, due to an error, the avatar could not be set successfully. Details:

changeavatar.tip0: Update your nmTeam Account profile picture.
changeavatar.tip1: Please fill in the URL that uses the https protocol and directly links to the image, such as https://example.com/example.png.
changeavatar.tip2: You can upload the picture to Tubed and get the link.
changeavatar.tip3: You can also upload the profile picture file directly:

name: Username
notLoged: You have not logged in yet, please log in first!
registerok0: The registration application is submitted successfully!
registerok1: Please log in to your email address and click on the link in an email with a link to complete the activation operation that we just sent to your email address to complete the email address verification to confirm that this email address is yours .
registerok2: If you do not receive the email, you can try to resend it or look for it in the spam and recycle bins of your mailbox. After the verification is successful, you can click the link at the bottom of the page to return to the login page.

To proceed to the next step, we will send an E-Mail to your mailbox.
Or, if you can't even use your E-Mail address, please contact nmTeam for support.
